creator: chbeer@web.de
text: If you use animated gifs using fo:external-graphic, fop hangs without any error!

I tried with a random animated GIF from the web, and it worked in FOP 0.20.3
It could be a problem with a specific GIF, a test case would have helped.

text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
